attributes.additional_details: if the footballers can take a paycut the workers of the uk too. we on small wages can donate in to Captain Toms NHS Donations why can't the MP'S Take a paycut
attributes.background: ALL the mps should take a paycut to help the nhs at this time of the virus

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for MPs' pay. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out more about IPSA here: https://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/
